pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Stable Matchings // Implements structural estimators to correct for the sample selection bias from observed outcomes in matching markets. This includes one-sided matching of agents into groups as well as two-sided matching of students to schools. The package also contains R code for three matching algorithms: the deferred-acceptance (or Gale-Shapley) algorithm for stable marriage and college admissions problems, the top- trading-cycles algorithm for house allocation and a partitioning linear programme for the roommates problem.
